character.statement: We knew Madison would be a star from the moment she was born. Just look at those cheekbones!
We can't go home, sweetie. We sold the house to pay for our bus fare to Hollywood, remember?
My Dakota is so talented. Look, she can cry on cue.
You... you're a natural! You've got the look of a star!
Just pay me a thousand dollars for your set-up fee and we'll get started.
Hmm. If it's money you need, I heard Harvey Scoops is looking for help with his gossip rag.
Oh my... there hasn't been an actress like this for decades. She was a big star!
I'll get you the next best thing....
Lacey WIlliams, at your service! This talent agency thing was just a safety net. I'll see you at the studio!
I don't have a thousand dollars!
Can you help me find an actress like this?
Where could we find someone like her?
